dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dark screen is lit up by twinkling stars .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baba?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, my son?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me a story .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The story of home . A meteorite drifts into frame , heading towards tiny Eart in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Millions of years ago , a meteorite made of vibranium, the strongest substance in the universe struck the continent of Africa affecting the plant life around it. The meteorite hits Africa and we see plant life and anima affected by vibranium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And when the time of man came , five tribes settled on it and called it Wakanda. The tribes lived in constant war with each other until a warrior shaman received a vision from the Panther goddess Bast who led him to the Heart Shaped Herb, a plant that granted him super human strength , speed, and instincts. A visual representation of the five tribes emerges as han from the sand animation, and we see them unite , and then break apart as conflict arises . Bashenga rises above the conflict and eats the Heart Shaped Herb, proceeding to un the tribes .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior became King and the first Black Panther , the protector of Wakanda .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four tribes agreed to live under the King's rule , but the Jabari tribe isolated themselves in the mountains. We see the Jabari striding off towards the isolated mount region.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Wakandans used vibranium to develop technology more advanced than any other nation , but as Wakanda thrived the world around it descended further into chaos. We see images of war and slavery just outside Wakanda ' s secretive border .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To keep vibranium safe , the Wakandans vowed to hide in plain sight, keeping the truth of their power from the outside world. We see the protective barrier rise around the Wakandan ci as we pull back on the Earth as it spins, now zooming in another part of the world ..В·

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we still hide Baba?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Towering apartment buildings loom over the horizon . Kids pickup basketball on a milk carton hoop when mysterious lights approach from the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An African man , N'JOBU (30s) sorts through firearms and over maps with another man , JAMES (20s , African America Live news footage of the 1992 Los Angeles Riots plays on TV. 3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey look , if we get in and out quick won't be any worries . You in the van come in through from the west , come around the corner, land right here. Me and the twins pulling up right here , we leavin' this car behind , ok? We corning ... Suddenly, N'Jobu hears something that we don't ... a fami sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hide the straps. James quickly moves into action, hiding the guns in the w as N'Jobu peers out a window , then clears the maps from table and unrolls a tapestry on the wall , hiding a bulle board. James cocks a handgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it the Feds?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. A KNOCK rattles the door . James walks over and looks out of a peep hole, then turns back with a confused expression .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's two Grace Jones looking chicks В·.. they're holding spears . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You serious?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They won't knock again . James opens the door and TWODORAMILAJE (members of the Al Female Wakandan Special Forces) slowly enter carrying LAR SPEARS They eye N' Jobu. .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince N'Jobu , son of Azzuri . 4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prove to me you are one of us . N'Jobu grabs his bottom lip and flips it, revealing a vibranium threaded TATTOOglowing blue with Wakandan scrip The Dora SWIFTLY SLAMtheir spears down in unison , making sound of an EMP. All electronics in the room instantly DI OUT .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is pitch black , then .. . BOOM The Dora hit the with their spears again and the lights come back ON, but YOUNG CHAKA(dressed in the ceremonial garb of the Black Panther) stands before them . N'Jobu kneels at the sight of him . He swats James , urgi to do the same .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My King . ..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young T'Chaka looks at James , who gapes in awe .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave us .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is James . I trust him with my life . He stays , with your permission , King T'Chaka . Young T'Chaka looks at him for a long beat .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As yo u wish . At ease .В·. Young T' Chaka removes his mask , hands it off to the Dor the women step out into the hall , closing the door behin them .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come baby brother .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Le t me see how you're holding up . N'Jobu stands. T'Chaka walks over to him and they embrace

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look strong . 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glory to Bast . I am in good health. How is home? Young T'Chaka's mood darkens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so good , baby brother. There has been an attack. Then , Young T'Chaka activates a simple looking beaded bracelet, KIMOYO BEADS that , project a hologram image of ULYSSES KLAUE .

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG T'CHAKA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This man , Ulysses Klaue , stole a quarter ton of vibraniurn from us and triggered a bomb at the border to escape . Many lives were lost . He knew where we hid the vibranium, and how to strike . N'Jobu takes the news in .

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG T'CHAKA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He had someone on the inside. Young T'Chaka waits for N' Jobu to come clean of the crim doesn't .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I want you look me in the eyes and tell me why you betrayed Wakanda .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did no such thing . Young T'Chaka snaps a look to James .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell him who you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zuri, Son of Badu .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? 6.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: N'Jobu's face goes ashen as James is revealed to be YOUNG ZURI, a Wakandan spy . Zuri reveals his vibranium lip tat N'Jobu grabs him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James, James you lied to me? I invite you into my home and you were Wakandan this whole time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You betrayed Wakanda!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How could you lie to me like -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand down. Did you think that you were the only spy we sent here? Zuri walks to the wall and removes a duffle bag containin VIBRANIUMCANISTERS glowing blue . He shows one to Young
T'Chaka .

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG T'CHAKA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Prince N'Jobu, you will return home at once, where you will face the council and inform them of your crimes .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A kid catches the basketball, gazing up as an AIRCRAFT WI STRANGE LIGHTS rises into the sky and speeds off . The ball drops.

dialogues.speaker: CABIN, ROYALTALONFIGHTER
dialogues.text: T'Challa, dressed in his Black Panther armor, sits at the console in the back of the ROYALTALONFIGHTER. A BBC news report plays on the screen .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tiny nation of Wakanda is mourning the death of its monarch , King T'Chaka. The beloved ruler was one of many confirmed dead after a terrorist attack at the United Nations a week ago . The Suspect has since been apprehended .

dialogues.speaker: BBC ANCHOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Though it remains one of the poorest countries in the world, fortified by mountain ranges and an impenetrable rain forest, Wakanda does not engage in international trade or accept aid . The succession of the throne is expected to fall to the oldest of the King's two children , Prince T'Challa . Piloting the craft while seated in lotus position is OKOY (30s , Head of the Dora Milaje.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My Prince , coming up on them now.
overhead view of a SIX CAR MILITARY CONVOY,moving like a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sinister serpent through the surrounding wilderness. We p back into the sky revealing the tip of a futuristic looki aircraft. This is the ROYALTALONFIGHTER (RTF) .

dialogues.speaker: CABIN, ROYALTALONFIGHTER
dialogues.text: T'Challa stands, and moves to a sand model of the convoy below . Okoye gets up out of her chair and grabs her SPEAR off th wall. She moves towards the back of the craft .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need, Okoye. I can handle this alone . Okoye pauses, then returns her spear to the wall . T'Chal closes the model and steps to a marked circle in the floo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: T'Challa slips on his helmet , revealing himself to be Bl Panther and folds his arms over his chest . Okoye opens h closed fist , dropping Panther out of the aircraft.

WHAM The discs mount themselves . to hoods of ALL THE VEHICLES sending a sonic ripple , through them , stopping the convoy in its tracks .

The pickup's driver climbs out , cocking a submachine gun looks into the forest in the wrong direction . Slowly approaching , the militant leader points to SHIFTI FOLIAGE in the direction of Panther. dialogues.speaker: . SO CAL,

Slipping behind a MILITANT, Nakia picks up the man's RIFL and quickly disassembles it as another MILITANT approache and using the BARRELlike a combat stick, puts him on his back , out cold. She leaps onto a second militant, easily taking him down striking him in the throat.

Then , as Panther walks towards him, Nakia dives out , kicking the young militant gun from his hand and grabs him in a neck-lock. Swinging around , Nakia kicks Panther in the chest, stopp his momentum. Caught off guard, Panther freezes .

dialogues.text: Hey! 1 ! and Nakia turn to a Panther find NIGERIAN MILITANT #2 holding at gunpoint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will be cro wned King tomorrow , and I wish for you to be there . Nakia looks at T'Challa deeply . Then turns , catching ey with one of the NIGERIAN CAPTIVES as Okoye brings them fr aro u nd the truck .

dialogues.text: Carry yourselves home now , and take the boy . Get him to his people . The Nigerian Woman nods .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will speak nothing of this day . T 'Challa loo k s at the Young Militant for a beat before Nakia and Okoye disappear through the trees . The Nigerian Women and the Young Militant look up at the as the RTF takes off . 12 .

TWOBORDERTRIBE KIDS (one boy, one girl) on horseback overtake them . Their horses hurdle ahead at a breakneck air as the RTF soars The horse riders pump their fists in the over a second mountain range .

dialogues.text: RAMONDA (S0s, Queen Mother of Wakanda), and SHUR! (18 , Princess of Wakanda) stand on the pad flanked by AYO . Okoye , Nakia and T'Challa exit the RTF and Nakia bows he head .

dialogues.text: Yes, general . Ayo nods and walks off with Nakia while Shuri watches closely .

dialogues.text: Did he freeze?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like an antelope in headlights. Shuri laughs at this .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you finished? Okoye slams her spear into the ground , signaling the res the Dora to follow her off . T'Challa turns to Shuri .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So surprised my little sister came to see me off before our big day . 14.

dialogues.text: You wish . I'm here for the EMP beads, I've developed an update.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Proud ... your father and I would talk about this day all the time . He is with us , and it is your time to be King .
Museum employees congregate outside as tourists and schoo groups move toward the main entrance . 15.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a black man in high-end street wear , around 30 ye old . A RING hangs on a gold chain around his neck . This ERIK KILLMONGER . Killmonger stands dangerously close to the glass containi SEVERALWEST AFRICAN ARTIFACTS They range from what looks . like iron gardening tools to masks and short range weapon Flanking the room are TWOSECURITY GUARDS slight , l y unnerved by his presence . We follow the MUSEUM DIRECTOR a British , woman (mid-40's) as she enters and walks up behind Killmonger as he studies t war masks .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was taken by British soldiers in Benin but it's from Wakanda and it's made out of vibranium . Don't trip, I'mma take it off your hands for you. She looks at Killmonger like he's crazy .

dialogues.text: These items aren't for sale.

dialogues.text: How do you think your ancestors got these? You think they paid a fair price? Or did they take it like they took everything else .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir , I'm going to have to ask you to leave . The Museum Director subtly looks back at the security gua then makes a face and touches her stomach -- indigestion Killmonger smiles and leans over, whispering in her ear .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, mate. Let's have it . Come on , mate.

dialogues.text: I think she might not be feelin' too good . 17.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Hey somebody get some help ! Come here! Call a doctor, please! Hey please, somebody come help ! The security guards quickly rush to the museum director's aid .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Medical Emergency right away in the West African Exhibit please . Right away ! Killmonger stands back and looks toward the door.

With the deadly spears at his back, T'Challa blocks COLOS OVERHEAD BLOWSwith his shield, then M' Baku leans with al his strength trying to impale T'Challa on the TIPS. Clubbing M'Baku to his heels , T'Challa rushes forward fo aerial attack only to be met by a VICIOUS KICK to the che causing him to LOSE both his shield and spear!

dialogues.text: T'CHAKA!l

dialogues.text: A man who has not prepared his children for his own death has failed as a father.

dialogues.text: Tell me how to best protect Wakanda. I want to be a great King, Baba . Just like you .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Stay.

dialogues.text: I came to support you , and to honor your father. But I can't stay. It's just ... ! found my calling out there . I've seen too many in need just to turn a blind eye . I can't be happy here knowing that there's people out there who have nothing . T'Challa thinks on this . 30 .

dialogues.text: What would you have Wakanda do about it? Nakia thinks for a bit .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Share what we have. We could provide aid and access to technology and refuge to those who need it ... other countries do it, we do it better.

dialogues.text: We are not like these other countries, Nakia. If the world found out what we truly are, and what we possess -- we could lose our way of life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wakanda is strong enough to help others and protect ourselves at the same time . Nakia gives T'Challa a look .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you were not so stubborn you would make such a great queen.

dialogues.text: I would make a great queen because I am so stubborn .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah! So you admit it !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: . .В· if that's what I wanted !

dialogues.text: We TRACKPAST several Border Tribesmen in a field, feeding and watering their pet HORSES and GOATS. Finally we come upon . . . W'Kabi feeding M20, his MASSIV RHINO by hand . T'Challa stands beside him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, if you said you wanted me and my men to go out there and clean up the world , then I'd be all for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But waging war on other countries has never been our way . Then , both of their Kimoyo beads buzz.

dialogues.text: My King . My love. You will never guess who just popped up on our radar.

dialogues.text: ornate chamber overlooking the Golden City . At the top o

dialogues.text: a golden pyramid, T' Challa , W'Kabi, Ramonda and ELDERS each tribe except the Jabari sit in a circle as Okoye bri them . W'Kabi and Ramonda flank T'Challa's throne .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A misidentified Wakandan artifact was stolen yesterday from a British museum . We have learned Ulysses Klaue plans to sell the vibraniurn to an American buyer in South Korea tomorrow night . There are audible murmurs at the name of Ulysses Klaue .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Klaue has escaped our pursuits for almost 30 years. Not capturing him was perhaps my father's greatest regret . I wish to bring Klaue back here to stand trial .

dialogues.speaker: MERCHANT TRIBE ELDER
dialogues.text: Wakanda does not need a warrior right now . We need a King .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My parents were killed when he attacked . Not a day goes by when I do not think about what Klaue took from us, from me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too great an opportunity to pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take me with you . We'll take him down together side by side, eh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need you here protecting the border. 33 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I ask, you kill him where he stands , or you bring him back to us .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have my word I will bring him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will proceed with the mission . Ramonda looks on , irresolute .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fully automated , like the old American movie Baba used to watch. And I made them completely sound absorbent . T'Challa stomps his foot down without a sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Interesting В·.В·

dialogues.text: Guess what I ca l l them . T'Challa thinks on this .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you .. . never mind. Shuri walks T'Challa over to two mannequins . One wears T'Challa's CURRENTSUIT . The other , just a panther tooth NECKLACE .

dialogues.text: (pointing to the necklace) Now look at these . T'Challa spots a GAUDIERGOLDTOOTHNECKLACE. She notices .

dialogues.text: Very nice.

dialogues.text: T'Challa turns to Ross .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After your questioning , we will to take him back to Wakanda with us . Ross stares at T'Challa for a beat .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? No. Look I like you, a lot. But he's in my custody now. He's not going anywhere . Listen , I 'm doing you a favor by letting you even be in here. Ross reaches out and touches T'Challa . Okoye steps in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he touches you again, I am going to impale him to this desk. Ross looks at Okoye, sensing the thinly veiled threat. He looks to T'Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does she speak English?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When she wants to. Ross and Okoye eye each other for a long beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going in . And when I'm done, you guys are up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Agent Ross .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yea. T'Challa puts his hand on Ross's shoulder .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do appreciate your help in Busan .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see that? It's called diplomacy . You're welcome. Ross walks through the door, closing it behind him . 60 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okoye! Play nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eh , Americans ...
Strapped to his chair, Klaue sings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, you really shouldn ' t trust the Wakandans. I'm much more your speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't trust anybody, not in this job . But what I am interested in is that arm cannon out there. Where'd you get that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's an old mining tool that I made some adjustments to. But I can get you one if you'd like .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you give me the name of your supplier and I'll ask them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's right outside , why don't you ask him yourself?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T' Challa? You're telling me that weapon on your arm is from Wakanda? Klaue nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bingo .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you actually know about Wakanda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shepherds . Textiles . Cool outfits. Ross stops as we notice a MICRO AUDIO BUG on his shoulder that T'Challa planted before he entered the room . 61 .
T'Challa and Okoye secretly listen to Klaue's interrogati

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all a front . Explorers searched for it for centuries . El Dorado : The Golden City . They thought they could find it in South America, but it was in Africa the whole time . A technological marvel. All because it was built on a mound of the most valuable metal known to man- Isipho- they call it . The gift . Vibranium ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vibranium yea . Strongest metal on Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not just a metal ... They sew it into their clothes , it powers their city, their tech, their weapons ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weapons?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yes . Makes my arm cannon look like a leaf blower .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a nice fairy tale but Wakanda is a third world country and you stole all their vibranium .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I stole all of it? Klaue can barely contain himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of it? I took a tiny piece of it . They have a mountain full of it. They've been mining it for thousands of years and still haven't scratched the surface .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm the only outsider who's seen it , and got out of there alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you don't believe me you ask your friend what his suit is made of ... what his claws are made of ... Ross looks back at the two way glass , then heads towards door .
ROSS exits the interrogation room and approaches T'Challa Okoye.

Lirnbani drives wi th Linda in the passe nger seat . Attached to the dashboard is a GPS TRACKINGTABLET DEVICE with a blinking BEACON(Klaue's prosthetic) inside the tra agency . We also see everyone's HEAT SIGNATURE including
Klaue seated alone.
Through the FRONT WINDOW Nakia watches , a PAINT TRUCKpass the building that doesn't seem right .
Ross studies T'Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your father to l d the UN that Klaue stole all the vibraniurn you had . But now he's telling me you have more?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you believe the word of an arms dealer , strapped to a chair. Ross hesitates , but doesn ' t bite .
The truck pulls to a stop at the rear of the building . 63 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killmonger emerges from the back of the truck with an ASS RIFLE with a GRENADE LAUNCHERATTACHMENT .

dialogues.speaker: INT. TRAVELAGENCYLOBBY, SOUTHKOREA- DAY
dialogues.text: On a computer monitor , we see SECURITY CAMERAFEEDS from outside the black site. Nakia wanders past the desk, eyeing over a travel agency employee's (CIA Agent) shoulder and freezes. SECURITY CAMERA FEED the alley is empty, but there is a VISIBLE GLITCH in the footage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back there . He points in the direction of the interrogation room .

dialogues.speaker: I/E . PAINT TRUCK, BACKALLEY, SOUTHKOREA- DAY
dialogues.text: Killmonger slips on the AFRICAN MASKfrom the British Muse then carries a DAISY-CHAIN OF EXPLOSIVES toward the build He sets the CHARGESagainst the outer wall of Klaue ' s ro and fearlessly leans against the structure next to the charges , he holds a detonator in his hand as Linda and Limbani lean against the wall next to him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much more are you hiding? Then suddenly . . . Nakia SLAMSthrough the door . CIA AGE draw their weapons. Nakia is unfazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's happening out back.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. REAR OF TRAVELAGENCY, SOUTHKOREA- DAY
dialogues.text: Then ... BOOM! THE CHARGESBLOW . carving В·. a hole in the wall. 64 .
Startled . .. they all break for the interrogation room b
Killmonger suddenly spins inside , laying down cover fire RIDDLING THE DOORWAY WITH BULLETS and SHATTERINGTHE TWO-W GLASS.

dialogues.speaker: INT. BLACKSITE OFFICE, TRAVELAGENCY, SOUTHKOREA- DAY
dialogues.text: Besieged with automatic GUNFIRE, everybody DUCKSdown. On instinct , Ross shoves Nakia to the floor, taking a ro to the back , saving her while . .. T'Challa's SUIT FORMSand he shields a CIA Agent. Okoye di clear of the doorway and the other agents scramble out in the travel agency for cover .

Linda and Lirnbani GRABKLAUEcarrying his entire chair wit him still strapped to it as ... Edging back toward the breach, Killmonger throws a live GRENADE through the shattered two-way window into the bla site office .
Panther instantly dives on the grenade and it EXPLODES, d no damage to him or the room, but lights up his entire su Panther bounds back to his feet to give chase as ...
Klaue cackles maniacally being loaded into the paint truc by Linda and Lirnbani .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see you took your time didn't you ! Killmonger continues to FIRE as Lirnbani and Linda hop in begin to pull off. 65.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walking backward after the truck , Killmonger swings the up to his shoulder as Panther emerges . The truck turns out of the alley as Killmonger aims. Pant charges at Killmonger and he FIRES! Taking the ROCKEThead on, Panther is ENGULFEDIN THE MASSIVE IMPACT and blown backward. Panther's suit is lit to the max with kinetic energy as h labors back to his feet , he spots the RING dangling arou Killmonger's neck on his gold chain . (It ' s identical t ring T'Challa inherited from T'Chaka in CA: CW ) . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My King! Panther turns to find Okoye .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My King ... Nakia.

dialogues.speaker: INT. BLACKSITE OFFICE, TRAVELAGENCY, SOUTHKOREA- DAY
dialogues.text: Panther and Okoye enter discovering agents and Nakia hove around Ross on the floor. The receptionist (also an agent applies pressure to his gunshot wound as a MALECIA AGENT checks his pulse . Shaken, Nakia looks to Panther.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He just jumped in front of me. Gravely wounded, Ross is barely conscious .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think he'll make it here, it hit his spine .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me a Kimoyo bead . T'Challa looks at Nakia and motions towards her Kimoyo be She pulls one off and hands it to him . T'Challa inserts into Ross' wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This will stabilize him for now .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give him to us . We can save him. 66 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The agents stare at Panther and his glowing high-tech sui

dialogues.speaker: CABIN, ROYALTALONFIGHTER
dialogues.text: Okoye is at the helm with Nakia standing next to her . Ne can believe Ross is on board . Further back in the aircraft, we find Ross' unconscious b T'Challa looms nearby, lost in thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our missions was to bring back Klaue . We failed . This man is a foreign intelligence operative. How do we justify bringing him into our borders?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He took a bullet for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was his choice . T'Challa stiffens. Okoye has gone a little too far. Torn, Nakia stares off, thinking about the Nigerian women they didn't bring back to Wakanda and her culpability in Ross' injury .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So now we are just supposed to let him die?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let us consider that we heal him. It is his duty to report back to his country. And as King, it is your duty to protect ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am well aware of my duties, General. I cannot just let him die knowing we can save him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where exactly are we taking him? 67 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shuri covertly l eads T'Challa , Okoye and Nakia inside , carrying Ross ' s body on a Maglev stretcher. She turns t T'Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great , another broken white boy for us to fi x. This is going to be fun. T' Challa cuts Shuri a look .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ros s is placed on a table surrounded by futuri s tic med equipment . As Shuri works on him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He will live . The security alarm on Shuri's Kimoyo bead GOES OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: W'Kabi is here . Shuri , Nakia and Okoye quickly hide . T'Challa hurries u ramp. Hoping for good news, W' Kabi approaches T'Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What ' s going on , brother? Where is Klaue?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not here . T'Challa's eyes lower regretfully .

dialogues.speaker: T'CHALLA, (CO NT'D)
dialogues.text: He slipped through our hands .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slipped? For 30 years your father was in power and did nothing . With you I thought it would be different . But it's more of the same . Deeply disappointed , W' Kabi can't muster words . He loo T'Challa and wal ks out . 68.

dialogues.speaker: AIRFIELD/GARAGE, SOUTHKOREA- EVENING
dialogues.text: An airplane graveyard . The paint truck pulls to a stop o airstrip . Killmonger, Klaue , Limbani and Linda hop out, hump their gear to a FOUR SEATER ESCAPE PLANE parked on t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: airstrip .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get going, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You always sell to the CIA?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sell to the highest bidder . Don' t you worry when I get back to Jo- burg and lay low for a bit, I ' ll make sure both you guys get paid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh I ain't worried about the money, bro . I know you're good for it . Klaue smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On our way back, just drop us of in Wakanda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't wanna go there, boy .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yea I do . Killmonger suddenly draws a HANDGUN and SHOOTSLIMBANI DEAD. Reacting to the shot , Klaue crowds Linda with a skilled GRAPPLINGMOVEand snatches her gun away before she can fir on him . Killmonger finds Klaue holding Linda's gun to her head, u her as his shield .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop it, or your little Bonnie and Clyde routine ends today . Put your gun down now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry . I'm sorry , Erik . 69.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's gonna be ok . Killmonger fires without hesitation . The BULLET TRAVELS THROUGH Linda , ki lli ng her while Klaue dives behind th plane , WOUNDED THE SHOULDER IN from the round . Killmonger moves to finish Klaue but he's gone . Followin Klaue's blood trail , Killmonger STALKS Klaue through the SCRAPYARD. Klaue fires at Killmonger , missing . Killmonger stops an turns, ducking between planes. Killmonger spots Klaue THR THE GLASS of a cockpit window and FIRES . Sniped through the window with precision , Klaue falls , Linda's gun . Ki l lmonger approaches and Klaue rolls to back to face him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Y-You really wanna go to Wakanda? They're savages. Klaue shows his BRANDEDneck .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what they do to people like us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I ain't worried about no brand . Check these out. Killmonger rolls up his sleeve , uncovering SEVERALAFRICA SCARIFICATION MARKSon his forearm .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Each one is for a kill .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can sca r yourself as much as you like . To them , you'll just be an outsider. You're crazy to think that you could walk in there . Killmonger flips the inside of his bottom lip, revealing glowing Wakandan TATTOO. Klaue can't believe his eyes .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And to think I saw you as some crazy Am erican . 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Klaue starts laughing, hard . Killmonger aims and pulls the trigger at point blank rang

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T'Challa enters to find Zuri tending to the garden. He lo around to the other Shamans.

dialogues.speaker: T ' CHALLA
dialogues.text: Leave us. They immediately head out . zuri turns to T'Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So your mission did not go as planned .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to my Uncle N'Jobu? My father told me he disappeared ... there was a man today wearing a ring identical to this one . Zuri turns back and T'Challa lifts his hand, showing his VIBRANIUMRING from CA: CW . zuri turns away uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is not possible .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He helped Klaue escape from us and he was wearing this ring . My grandfather ' s ring . Do not tell me what is possible tell me the truth .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some truths are too much to bear , T'Challa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is not your choice to make. What happened to him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I promised the King to say nothing .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am your King now! Zuri looks up. 71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your uncle took a War Dog assignment in America . Your father placed me there to observe unbeknownst to him. Your uncle fell in love with an American woman. They had a child . The hardships he saw there radicalized your uncle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: N'JOBU makes his plea to YOUNG T'CHAKA, picking up where left off in the Oakland sequence .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I observed for as long as I could ! Their leaders have been assassinated , communities flooded with drugs and weapons , they are overly policed and incarcerated. All over the planet our people suffer because they don't have the tools to fight back. With vibranium weapons they could overthrow every country and Wakanda could rule them all , the right way . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He knew your father would not support this , so your uncle betrayed us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No . В·.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He helped Klaue steal the vibranium .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no no no no no . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young T'Chaka turns to N'Jobu. 72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will return home at once , where you will face the council and inform them of your crimes . N'Jobu reaches into his waistband and pulls a HANDGUN,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: it at James/Young Zuri's head, freezing him .

dialogues.speaker: ZURI, (0. S .)
dialogues.text: He drew his weapon on me Young T'Chaka pops his claws . He quickly springs forward digging his CLAWSinto the slide and destroying it , befor can pull the trigger . He then buries his CLAWSinto N'Job chest , killing him instantly . He lets N'Jobu's body dro the floor, and closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your father killed his own brother . ..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To save my life .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Zuri looks at Young T'Chaka with tears welling up i his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speak nothing of this .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the child ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We left him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the young kids playing basketball, who is now reve to be YOUNG KILLMONGER stands looking up at the sky where mysterious lights flickered. 73.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We had to maintain the lie . Gutted , T'Challa can't reconcile what he's just heard . turns his back on Zuri .

dialogues.speaker: , PLAINS
dialogues.text: Dragging a LARGEBAG, Killmonger approaches . In the dista we see the four-seater plane . W'Kabi approaches as Killmonger drops the bag .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a 'lil gift . Killmonger opens his bag , revealing KLAUE'S CORPSE W'Kab . eyes widen, and his men draw their swords .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: DESIGN GROUP- MORNING
dialogues.text: Ross suddenly opens his eyes and reaches for his gunshot wound finding it astonishingly almost fully healed. Shuri tinkers with the circuitry of a PAIR OF MASSIVE CLA VIBRANIUMGAUNTLETS across the room as Ross sits up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, where am I? Startled, Shuri spins .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't scare me like that, colonizer .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Colon-who? My name is Everett .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes , I know . Everett Ross former airforce pilot and now, CIA. 74 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right. Groggy, Ross gazes around at the completely unique technology .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok, is this Wakanda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it ' s Kansas .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... How long ago was Korea?

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: Yesterday .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so . Bullet wounds don't just magically heal overnight.

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: They do here. But not by magic , by technology.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't touch anything . My brother will return soon. Leery, Shuri watches Ross wander about out of the corner her eye . He walks over to the observation deck and gazes awe at the exposed GLOWING ROCKS inside of the VIBRANIUM MINE. Suddenly an AUTOMATED MINING CART whips between light pan floating above a rail .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These train things ... that's magnetic levitation, right?

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: Obviously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obviously ... but I've never seen it this efficient . The light panels, what are they?

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: Sonic stabilizers . 75 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sonic what?

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: In it's raw form , vibranium is too dangerous to be transported at that speed , so I developed a way to temporarily deactivate it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's vibranium on those trains?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is vibranium all around us. That's how I healed you. Ross tries to process this as a 3D PROJECTION OF OKOYE unexpectedly forms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is T'Challa? His Kimoyo beads have been switched off . Ross, amazed , tries to touch the sand projection .

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: Well we are not joined at the hip , Okoye .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man showed up at the border who claims to have killed Klaue.

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: W'Kabi is transporting him as we speak to the pa l ace. We need to find your brother .

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: An outsider?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, a Wakandan . An IMAGE OF KILLMONGER from the border appears on Shuri's monitor . Then . . . Ross slowly walks into sight, staring at the s 76 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not a Wakandan . He's one of ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T'Challa and Nakia gaze out off the side of a beautiful overlook .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He killed his own brother ... and left a child behind with nothing . What kind of King В· . . what kind of man does that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No man is perfect . Not even your father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn ' t even give him a proper burial ... My Uncle N'Jobu betrayed us , but my father may have created something even worse .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey . Look at me. You can't let your father ' s mistakes define who you are . You get to decide what kind of King you are going to be. They share a look as T'C ha l la's Kimoyo beads buzz .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brother , you need to get here now. T' Chall a and Nakia look at each othe r.

dialogues.speaker: INT. SHURI'S LAB, WAKANDADESIGN GROUP- DAY
dialogues.text: T'Cha l la , Shuri and Nakia listen as Ross briefs them o Killmonger. A BODYSCAN IMAGEof Killmonger is on Shuri's monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric Stevens . Graduated Annapolis age 19 . MIT for grad school . Joined the SEALs and went to Afghanistan where he racked up confirmed kills like it was a video game . They him Killmonger . He

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: joined a JSOC ghost unit .

dialogues.speaker: ROSS, (CONT' D)
dialogues.text: Now these guys are serious . They will drop off the grid so they can commit assassinations and take down governments .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did he reveal anything about his identity?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has a War Dog tattoo but we have no record of him . T' Challa and Shuri share a look .

dialogues.speaker: INT. TRIBAL COUNCILROOM- DAY
dialogues.text: T'Challa sits on his throne surrounded by the Tribal Elde Ramonda , Shuri , Okoye , and the Dora .

dialogues.speaker: RIVER TRIBE ELDER
dialogues.text: Is this man Wakandan or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell us what is going on . Killmonger is escorted in by W'Kabi . W 'Kabi tensely steps next to T'Challa as Killmonger take place before the circle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speak .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm standing in your house . Serving justice to a man who stole your vibranium and murdered your people . Justice your King couldn't deliver. T'Challa walks close enough to Killmonger to be able to whisper to him . 78 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care that you brought Klaue, the only reason I don't kill you where you stand is because I know who you are ... now what do you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want the throne . The entire room scoffs at this . Some ELDERS even hold th heads back and laugh .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My goodness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y'all sittin' up here comfortable. Must feel good . There's about 2 billion people all over the world that looks like us but their lives are a lot harder , Wakanda has the tools to liberate them all .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what tools are those?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vibranium . Your weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our our weapons will not be used to wage war on the world . It is not our way to be judge jury and executioner for people who are not our own .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not your own? But didn't life start here , on this continent? So ain ' t all people your people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am not King of all people. I am King of Wakanda. And it is my responsibility to make sure our people are safe and that vibranium does not fall into the hands of a person like you. The elders murmur at Killmonger's disrespect. They wait t see how T'Challa will respond . Then , Ramonda suddenly s 79 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son , we have entertained this charlatan for too long. Reject his request . Killmonger eyes the Elders with an amused grin .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I ain't requesting nothing ! Ask who I am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are Eric Stevens. An American black operative . A mercenary nicknamed Killmonger. That's who you are .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not my name , Princess . Ask me, King?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ask me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take him away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am N'Jadaka, son of Prince N'Jobu . A hush fa l ls over the room . The tribal elders knew N'J This changes EVERYTHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The son of N'Jobu?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I found my daddy with Panther claws in his chest . You ain't the son of a King you're the son of a murderer! 80 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You' re lying!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid not Queen Mother .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: W'Kabi produces Killmonger's GOLD NECKLACEand RING. Holdi it up for everyone to see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The descendant of N'Jobu .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Auntie .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm exercising my blood right to challenge for the mantles of King and Black Panther . Utter silence as all eyes turn to T'Challa . T'Challa desperately wants to refuse but knows that isn't possible

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do not do this T'Challa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the son of N'Jobu he is within his rights .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has no rights here.

dialogues.speaker: RIVER TRIBE ELDER
dialogues.text: The challenge would take weeks to prepare .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weeks? I don't need weeks. The whole country ain't gotta be there I just need him ... and somebody to get me out of these chains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T'Challa, what do you know of this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I accept your challenge. W'Kabi looks at T'Challa closely . 81 .

dialogues.speaker: POOL
dialogues.text: T'Challa and Killmonger stand opposite one another. Killmonger SNAPS OFF a spear ' s shaft with his foot and a SWORD go with the SPEARHEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Tribal Elders , W'Kabi , and the Dora look on from th respective places . Shuri watches with Ramonda , but the are entirely empty .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He will never beat T' Challa . He should have just come to t he first challenge and gotten it over with . Ramonda looks concerned . She ' s not so sure.

dialogues.speaker: POOL
dialogues.text: Zuri brings T'Challa the DEATHHERB and he repeats the process , poisoning T'Challa while Killmonger stares on silently .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The King will now have the strength of the Black Pa nther stripped away . Staring T'Challa down, Killmonger suddenly turns to Zuri They recognize each other. Zuri looks away ashamed.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE SEATING AREA
dialogues.text: Nakia arrives through a tunnel and wal ks up to Okoye , w turns to her .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is Agent Ross?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I locked him in the office . He's not going anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T' Challa holds his short spear and shield. He stares at cousin .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your last chance, thro w down your weapons and we can handle this another way. 82 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killmonger slams his blades into the stone .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I lived my entire life waiting for this moment. I trained, I lied, I killed, just to get here. He takes off his vest and tears at his shirt, revealing t SCARIFICATION MARKSthat go up his arm and across his enti back. They number in the hundreds .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I killed in America, Afghanistan, Iraq . I took life from my own brothers and sisters right here on the continent . And all this death , just so I can kill you . T'Challa looks to Zuri and nods .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let the challenge begin . Killmonger tears forward with expert knife work and T'Cha with skilled defense . T'Challa PARRIES several strikes , countering with a LEG DOWN but hesitates with his sword and doesn't strike as t roll toward the edge of the waterfall . Back on their feet , they circle , and Killmonger lunges T'Challa who dodges. T'Challa manages to knock Killmonger his feet , gaining the advantage .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yield ! Killrnonger FEROCIOUSLY BOBS INSIDE , but T'Challa lunges Killrnonger, giving him a superficial SLASH ACROSS his ch Fueled by rage, Killmonger begins to overpower T'Challa . slices T'Challa ' s thigh .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snap out of it T'Challa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wielding both blades , Killmonger slashes deep across T'Challa's stomach, then spins, CUTTING deep into his bic 83 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurt , T'Challa realizes his compassion was a mistake and must fight back but blood leaks from his side. Killmonger dodges T'Challa ' s next attack . Stumbling , T'Challa is unable to avoid Killmonger's BLAD BEING THRUST into his ribs . The elders gasp as Ramonda looks away and Shuri just star

dialogues.speaker: POOL
dialogues.text: Killmonger snatches the knife out. T'Challa can barely st Killmonger punches him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get up .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He continues to PUNCHT'CHALLA REPEATEDLYuntil he topples over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is for my father . Killmonger walks swiftly toward T'Challa to deliver his deathblow .. . only to have a guilt-ridden Zuri STOP HIM his SPEAR knocking his blade away .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zuri , no .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zuri .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zuri don ' t !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the cause of your father's death. Not him . Take me . Regrouping, Killrnonger grabs Zuri's spear . T'Challa lab get up but can't . 84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take you both , Uncle James ... Killmonger skewers Zuri with his spear. Killmonger drives the spear in further and GRABBINGTHE BL with both hands in death, Zuri falls with it to the shall water as T'Challa watches in utter torment .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nol Zuri no! Zuri!! Noo! Fueled by rage, T'Challa lifts back up to his feet. He charges Killmonger , who ducks his attacks, while talking the audience .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this your King? Huh? T'Challa swings his spear, Killmonger ducks .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this your King? The Black Panther , who's supposed to lead you into the future .

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: Come on brother! Nakia looks on, trying to hide her tears with Okoye and A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there nothing that can be done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Him? He's supposed to protect you. Killmonger ducks another attack from T'Challa and scoops onto his shoulders .

dialogues.speaker: POOL
dialogues.text: Killmonger walks to the edge of the challenge pool .

dialogues.speaker: NA.KIA
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killmonger heaves T'Challa off the waterfall. Staggered, everyone watches T'Challa DISAPPEAR BELOWto his death . Ramonda screams .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah . I'm your King .

dialogues.speaker: ON NA.KIA
dialogues.text: Nakia shuttles Shuri and Ramonda into the caves while Oko stays behind .

dialogues.speaker: NA.KIA
dialogues.text: We have to go now ! Queen mother, let's go !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Staggered , the new Shaman gives him the Panther necklace Everyone slowly salutes Killmonger .

dialogues.speaker: INT. TRIBAL COUNCIL ROOM- NIGHT
dialogues.text: The room seems empty until we come upon Okoye grieving al After a moment, the door opens and Okoye quickly wipes he eyes . Pulling it together , she stands as Nakia approach The two women silently take each other in , sharing in th sorrow .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen Mother and Shuri ... they are safe? Nakia nods .

dialogues.speaker: NA.KIA
dialogues.text: Yes .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: NA.KIA
dialogues.text: We should get to them immediately . 86 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: cannot . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Though my heart is with you .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We cannot turn over our nation to a man who showed up here only hours ago .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is of royal blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He killed T ' Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In ritual combat .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does that really matter? Okoye quiets .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are the greatest warrior Wakanda has . Help me overthrow him before he becomes too strong . Okoye stares at Nakia in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overthrow? ! Nakia , I am not a spy who can come and go as they so choose. I am loyal to the throne, no matter who sits upon it . What are you loyal to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I loved him. I love my country too .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you serve your country.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I save my country . Nakia takes off. 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ross walks around the office , admiring masks on the wall looks around as the door unlocks to Nakia, holding severa blankets . Ross realizes something is wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong? Nakia tosses the blanket to Ross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The King is dead . Come with me, unless you want to join him . Ross's heart sinks as . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killmonger enters and a Shaman guides him to a dirt plot where they begin to bury him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shuri and Ramonda, wrapped in blankets as a disguise , si a log surrounded by a THICKET OF TREES. Grief stricken , hold each other closely .

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: First Baba, and now my brother . Mama we didn't , even get to bury him . Ramonda doesn't have an answer. The women hear a rustle in the trees , Ramonda moves to protect Shuri, holding ONE OF NAKIA'S RINGBLADESas Nakia Ross emerge from the foliage . Ramonda eyes Ross .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nakia. Who is this man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a friend of T ' Challa's he saved my life . Ramonda studies Ross , then looks to Nakia. 88 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is Okoye?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okoye is not corning . She and Dora Milaje will serve the new King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait here .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What has happened to our Wakanda? Nakia turns and heads into an even thicker BATCHOF FOLIAG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SHAMAN scoops water into the Heart Shaped Herb ceremoni vessel and grinds it . Killrnonger opens his mouth and she pours the solution in his eyes slowly close .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allow the Heart Shaped Herb to give you the powers of the Black Panther and take you to the Ancestral Plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the kids gazing up as an AIRCRAFT WITH STRANGELIGH rises into the sky and speeds off . Young Killrnonger runs into the apartment complex .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOUNG KILLMONGER enters to find N'Jobu's dead body on the floor. He runs over to his dad, cradling him in his arms sobbing .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They scoop dirt on top of Killrnonger's face . 89 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adult Killmonger enters his childhood apartment and sees place where his father died . He walks over to the WALLHI and digs out a METALSTASH BOX . He breaks open the box and inside finds N'JOBU'S JOURNAL, cash and a pistol. Opening the diary, he finds details of Wakandan history a life, including drawings . He finds his father's RING on necklace and puts it on . Then , Killmonger looks up and N'JOBU is sitting across f him alive .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did I tell you about going into my things?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you find? Killmonger is now replaced by his younger self .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your home .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gave you a key hoping that you might see it someday .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Killmonger flips down his lip , touching his tattoo .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. The sunsets there are the most beautiful in the world . But I fear you still may not be welcome .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They will say you are lost .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, I'm right here . doesn ' t have an answer for this .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No tears for me? 90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody dies . It's just life around here . N'Jobu's gaze darkens with regret.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well look at what I have done. I should have taken you back long ago . Young Killmonger has now been replaced by adult Killmonge who sheds a tear .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instead, we are both abandoned here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well maybe your home is the one that's lost . That's why they can't find us. N'Jobu stares at his son , heartbroken .

dialogues.speaker: INT . HALL OF KINGS, CITY OF THE DEAD
dialogues.text: Killmonger's eyes open - a new man . Powerful. And ready conquer the world . He gasps for air . As he climbs to his feet encircled by Kingsguard and sham

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Breathe, my King . Breathe !
Nakia drops through a hole into the warren of tunnels, emerging in the ...

dialogues.speaker: INT . HALL OF KINGS, CITY OF THE DEAD
dialogues.text: Reveling in the power of the Heart Shaped Herb, Killmonge walks toward a dirt plot filled with the HEART SHAPEDHERB The shamans trail behind him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Heart Shaped Herb did that? The shaman nods. 91.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is all of it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes . So when it comes time for another King, we will be ready .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another King .. . yea go ahead and burn all that . Alarmed , the shamans don't move, hoping Killmonger doesn mean it ... but he does .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My King , we cannot do that . It is our tradition -- Killmonger smiles , the n quick l y grabs the Shaman by t throat .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I tell you to do something , I mean that shit . Burn it all ! He lets her go as she gasps for air . Shell-shocked , the shamans move into action .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nakia digs out a flawless Heart Shaped Herb and in an ins darts back for the catacombs , glancing back at Killmonge from the shadows .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kil l monger stands in front of the dirt plots as the her garden is engulfed in FLAMESaround him .

dialogues.speaker: INT. TRIBAL COUNCIL ROOM- DAY
dialogues.text: Every Elder , the Border Tribe military leaders , includi W'Kabi, the Kingsguard leaders , Okoye , and the Dora pre for a council meeting. Killmonger strolls in , wearing the new gold panther neck 92.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, where I'm from, when black folks started revolutions , they never had the firepower or resources to fight their oppressors . Where was Wakanda? Hmm? Yea all that ends today. We got spies embedded in every nation on Earth . Already in place . Killmonger stands and walks looking each of them in the e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know how colonizers think. So we're gonna use their own strategy against them . We' re gonna send vibranium weapons out to our War Dogs . They'll arm oppressed people all over the world, so they can finally rise up and kill those in power, and their children and anyone else who takes their side . It ' s time they know the truth about us . We're warriors. The world's gonna start over and this time we're on top . Killmonger sits .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun will never set on the Wakandan Empire. Okoye looks to W'Kabi .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wakanda has survived for so long by fighting when only absolutely necessary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wakanda has survived in the past this way , yes. But the world is changing , General . Elders , it is getting smaller. The outside world is catching up and soon it will be the conquerors , or the conquered . I'd rather be the former .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You heard your orders. Let's get to it. W'Kabi salutes while Okoye looks on . 93 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nakia leads Shuri, Ramonda and Ross through the bitter wi and harsh conditions .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where are we going again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're taking the Heart Shaped Herb to Jabariland .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heart Shaped Herb , what is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It gives whoever takes it heightened abilities .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's what made T'Challa so strong . Ramonda stops in her tracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nakia. I don't like this. The Herb belongs to us. We may be creating a bigger monster with M'Baku.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nakia , you should take it yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a spy with no army . I wouldn't stand a chance .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll go . They keep walking. Suddenly , they are surrounded by MEMB OF THE JABARI ARMY .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay calm .
M'Baku stares down from his throne at Nakia, Ramonda and Shuri . He glowers at Ross for a long beat, unnerving everyone, before finally turning to Ramonda .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My son was murdered in ritual combat . 94 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Were the odds fair?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, but . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, it was less a murder than a defeat? This irks Shuri.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do not rub our noses in it --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence! I make the pronouncements here, girl .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look uh, your highness, the new King is a -- M'Baku drowns out Ross' voice with loud barks. The surrounding Jabari follow suit .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You cannot talk . One more word and I will feed you to my children . Ross looks petrified until M'Baku winks at Ramonda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm kidding. We are vegetarians . Stepping in , Nakia pulls out the HEART SHAPEDHERB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great Gorilla M'Baku. This is why we are here. To offer this to you. An outsider s i ts on our throne. Only you can help us stop him . M'Baku considers . His ego stroked. But .. .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: HUT
dialogues.text: M'Baku leads Nakia, Ross, Ramonda and Shuri to JABARI HEA working on T'Challa in a small hut in the sno w. 95 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Impossible .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he breathing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is in a coma , barely clinging to life .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tough weathered JABARI FISHERMANwalks along a frigid ri with his YAK .

dialogues.speaker: M' BAKU, (V. 0 .)
dialogues.text: One of our fishermen found him at the edge of the river border. He brought him to me. The yak pulls a wooden sleigh carrying T'Challa's body , toward Jabariland .

dialogues.speaker: HUT
dialogues.text: M'Baku, Ramonda , Nakia, Ross , and Shuri remain standing T'Challa in the snow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you have him in the snow? !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is the only thing keeping him from joining the ancestors .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to get him to my lab! I can heal him there .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take him. He ' ll be dead in seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nakia , the Herb . Ramonda takes the herb from Nakia and pushes past M'Baku looks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I call upon the ancestors. I call upon Bast . I am here with my son T'Challa . Heal him . We must bury him . 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Resigned, Shuri and Nakia watch closely sitting down next her as Ramonda performs the ritual on T'Challa, pouring t solution in his mouth, while praying in Xhosa , then scoo the snow atop his body .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Praise the ancestors .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Praise the ancestors .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Praise the ancestors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Praise the ancestors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wake up, T'Challa . Wake up .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T'Chaka beckons T'Challa toward several other black panth and people in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My son . He looks at his ancestors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The time has come for you to come home and be reunited with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you bring the boy home? T'Chaka looks back at him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, Baba?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He ... he was the truth I chose to omit . 97 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were wrong to abandon him .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I chose my people . I chose Wakanda . Our future depended on --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were wrong ! All of you were wrong ! To turn your backs on the rest of the world . We let the fear of our discovery stop us from doing what is right . No more! I cannot stay here with you. I cannot rest while he sits on the throne . He is a monster of our own making . I must take the mantle back , I must. I must right these wrongs . T'Chaka looks at his son , his disappointment giving way proud smile .

dialogues.speaker: HUT
dialogues.text: T'Challa suddenly awakens and is pulled from the snow by Ramonda unsure where he is .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have a blanket? They embrace. T'Challa turns to see Nakia and Shuri as we The four of them embrace as M'Baku looks on .
Our entire team of heroes : T'Challa , Nakia , Shuri , Ra Ross talk .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killmonger has the full support of our military . And he burned the garden of the Heart Shaped Herb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course he did . The T'Challa turns to Ross .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what he was trained to do. His unit used to work with the CIA to destabilize foreign countries .

dialogues.speaker: ROSS, (CONT D)
dialogues.text: They would always strike at transitions of power ... like an election year or the death of a monarch. You get control of government, the military

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our resources . The Great Mound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our vibranium . All of my designs .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He will send our weapons all over the world . T' Challa turns to Nakia .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (motioning to Shuri and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must get them out of Wakanda safely .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The challenge will have to continue .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T' Challa , we will not leave Wakanda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is my duty to keep you safe .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he gets control of our technology , no where will be safe . Shuri pulls T'Challa's PANTHERTOOTHNECKLACEfrom her pocke and places it on his neck . T'Challa smiles .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Panther lives . And when he fights for the fate of Wakanda I will be right there beside him . 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As will I. T'Challa smiles he looks to Nakia and Ramonda who looks b at him with confidence .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in too. The Wakandans cut Ross a look

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? You're gonna need all the help you can get. The Wakandans smile at Ross as M'Baku interrupts .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you done? Are you - are you done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could you give me and Lord M' Baku a moment? Everyone exits and M'Baku gazes at T'Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I owed you a great debt. A life for a life. Consider it paid .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please allow my mother to stay here .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No harm wi l l come to her I give you my word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I could use an army as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet you could . But no . I will give no Jabari lives towards your cause . 100 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is our cause . It is for all of us .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Us? You are the first King to come here in centuries . And now you speak of us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I cannot speak for past Kings . But an enemy sits on the throne right now. We both know the power of vibraniurn . If Killmonger gets control of it, who do you think he will come for next? M'Baku sits .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will not help you . T' Challa walks out , leaving M'Baku to think .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A train car carrying carts full of vibranium moves across ground, it then takes a turn up the sides and up to the surface out to---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

The RTF guns in the air at a 45 degree angle and BAM it, explodes as it collides with CARGOSHIP , deactivating its cloaking mode , causing pieces of the RTF and the CARGOSH to rain down over the Wakandan border .

M'Baku , surrounded by Border Tribesmen is held up while W'Kabi atop M20 comes charging straight at him , giving h nowhere to go , but at the last second, Okoye steps in fr of M'Baku , staring M20 down who gallops towards her , an stops at the very last second , his horn inches from Okoy face , M20 licks her face lovingly . 116 .

dialogues.text: This is it for you , cousin . T'Challa turns towards the train and sees that it is abou end. He lets Killmonger swing towards him and dodges , backing even closer to the edge of the track, and Killmonger swin again - but this time T'Challa punches Killmonger's arm , jarring the blade lose and sending it flying up into the T'Challa then does a ROLLING ARMBAR TAKEDOWN the

As th BROKENSPEAR drops T'Challa catches it with his right hand and slams it into Killmonger's chest, just as both their suits form around them . Killmonger removes his helmet , then looks down at the bl that is buried in his chest . T'Challa, realizing this is it , removes his mask as well 117 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell of a move . Killmonger struggles to breathe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My pops said Wakanda was the most beautiful thing he'd ever seen. He promised he was going to show it to me some day . Can you believe that? Kid from Oakland running around believing in fairy tales. Killmonger winces from the pain . T'Challa stands and pic Killmonger up , dragging him to his feet .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's beautiful . T'Challa thinks for a long beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we can still heal you . Killmonger thinks on this .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? So you can just lock me up? Nah . Just bury me in the ocean, with my ancestors that jumped from the ships . . . 'cause they knew death was better than bondage. Killmonger pulls the knife out of his chest, killing hims instantly. T'Challa looks down at his cousin's now lifele body and becomes emotional.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. You saved me. You saved my family . Our nation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is nothing to thank me for. It is our duty to . .. it was my duty to fight for what I love . I should

dialogues.text: T'Challa kisses her .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't blame me I almost died . Nakia looks at him deeply, and kisses him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay . I think I know a way you can still fulfill your calling. Please stay. Nakia looks at T' Challa with curious eyes. She kisses hi

dialogues.text: T'Challa and Shuri, dressed in subtle clothing , look at now abandoned apartment building . In the distance a grou SIX KIDS (mostly Black, some Latino), play three on a rug basketball hoop .
