dialogues.text: When you said you would take me to California for the first time, I thought you meant Coachella, or Disneyland . Why here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is where our father killed our uncle. Shuri looks at T'Challa, shocked by his bluntness. She tu and stares closely at the building. We see her POV of lar SIGNAGE that hints that the building is soon to be demolished . 119.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are tearing it down. Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not tearing it down . . . I bought this building. Shuri turns to him confused .

dialogues.speaker: T' CHALLA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And that building , and that one over there ... This will be the first Wakandan International Outreach Center . Shuri smiles at the surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nakia will oversee the social outreach ... And you will spearhead the science and information exchange . Shuri turns to T'Challa in shock at what this means.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're kidding ! T'Challa hits a button on his Kimoyo bead , and the RTF c out of cloaking , revealing itself to have been parked be the kids playing basketball . A YOUNG BLACKKID turns back to see the ship as the other kids collectively lose their shit .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? ! Man what the hell is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's like a Buggati space ship !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woah, it came out of nowhere !!! Did y'all see that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What . ..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They start to run up to the ship and touch it . Unsure at first .

dialogues.speaker: OAKLANDKID
dialogues.text: We can take this back to the house y'all. .. 120 .

dialogues.speaker: OAKLAND KID
dialogues.text: We could pull up to school in this !

dialogues.speaker: OAKLAND KID
dialogues.text: Hey look , we can break it apart and we can sell it!

dialogues.speaker: KID
dialogues.text: On Ebay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody get like a million a piece . She starts off towards the kids, walking past the Young B Kid.

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: Uhhh I wouldn't do that if I were you guys ...

dialogues.speaker: OAKLAND KID
dialogues.text: Where you come from?

dialogues.speaker: SHUR
dialogues.text: From Wakanda .

dialogues.speaker: OAKLAND KID
dialogues.text: What is a Wakanda? The Young Black Kid approaches T'Challa .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey yo ! Is this yours?

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG BLACKKID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Who... who are you? T'Challa thinks on this and smiles .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T'Challa walks , flanked by Nakia, Okoye and Ayo . 121 .

dialogues.speaker: INT . UNITED NATIONS ASSEMBLYBUILDING
dialogues.text: Several assembly members move around the room preparing f meeting . Suddenly a hush falls over the hall as the Waka enter and walk up to the center pit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My name is King T'Challa , son of King T'Chaka . I am the sovereign ruler of the Nation of Wakanda and for the first time in our history we will be sharing our knowledge and resources with the outside world. Wakanda will no longer watch from the shadows . We cannot , we must not. We will work to be an example of how we as brothers and sisters on this Earth should treat each other . Now more than ever , illusions of division threaten our very e x istence. We all know the truth : more connects us than separates us . In times of crisis , the wise build bridges , while the foolish build barriers . We must find a way to look after one another, as if we were one single tribe . The audience of WORLD LEADERS look around , bemused, wond what Wakanda could possibly have to offer .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: can't help but lean into his microphone .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With all due respect , King T'Challa , what can a nation of farmers offer to the rest of the world? There are a few chuckles from the gallery . Nakia , Okoye Ayo share a look. T'Challa smiles .

dialogues.speaker: MEDICINE HUT
dialogues.text: Open on three NECROPOLITAN CHILDREN WITH PAINTED FACES looming directly over something, staring with curiosity . 122 .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera moves, startling the children who quickly flee hut .

dialogues.speaker: MEDICINE HUT
dialogues.text: The kids race out of the hut and over to Shuri.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you playing around with that man again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Nol

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're teasing him again? Bucky exits the hut to the sight of a beautiful Wakandan lakeside. He takes it all in with a deep breath . Outside hut are WAKANDAN SHAMAN (Man and Woman) and SHURI, embrac the three giggling CHILDREN TWODORAMILAJE observe Shuri . from a close distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emhlophe Ingcuka. (white wolf) Bucky settles next to Shuri taking in her view of the lak

dialogues.text: Good morning , Sgt . Barnes .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bucky .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you feeling?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. Thank you. Shuri smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come. Much more for you to learn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He follows Shuri towards the other huts.
